message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product. I think it would be very valuable to you.  I'm asking for $14,000 to start.
I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000.
I understand your position, Bob, but $9,000 is too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,250. I'm willing to make a serious offer on the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
